definitions.definition: The use of ultrasound to produce images of the heart ; especially, cardiac ultrasonography done with cardiology-specific devices and training, as contrasted with POCUS applied cardiovascularly by any clinician.

main_definition: ( medicine ) The use of ultrasound to produce images of the heart ; especially, cardiac ultrasonography done with cardiology-specific devices and training, as contrasted with POCUS applied cardiovascularly by any clinician.
